subtitle: It is not worth making your own puff pastry - buy either ready rolled or in a block, fresh or frozen.

method.text: Place fish in an ovenproof dish. Add stock and bake for 20 min.
Flake fish into bite-sized pieces, discarding any skin and bone. Reserve stock. Divide fish between individual ovenproof dishes.
Melt butter in a pan. Add flour to make a roux and cook gently for 2-3 min.
Gradually blend in half the stock and the cream. Bring to boil, stirring. Season to taste. Add dill and prawns and spoon over the cooked fish in the ovenproof dishes.

Roll out pastry and cut to make lids for the dishes. Using a sharp knife, gently score the surface of the pastry in a criss-cross pattern. Place pastry lids on the pie dishes and brush with beaten egg.
Bake for 25-30 min or until well risen and golden.

title: Creamy fish pie
